name: B.O.A.T
description:
A submission for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2

Title: B.O.A.T: Ballistic Ocean Adventure Time

Tagline: A nautical action / puzzler....with fireworks

Description: Mayday! Mayday! We've got an ocean emergency on our hands! The lovely Atlantic trade routes that used to bustle and teem with commerce have slowed to crawl, thanks to the deadliest scourge on the seven seas: fireworks. As the captain of the good ship H.M.S. Fusemaster, you've been tasked with blowing up the most deadly barrels so that the ichor of capital can flow freely once again.

But watch yourself, seafarer! Who knows what combustible surprises those barrels contain. And heaven help us all if you set off some kind of pyrotechnic chain reaction!

Objective: Destroy the target barrels

Controls: Move with WASD. Shoot with the mouse.
